name: Baby 5
text: On Play: You may discard 1 card from your hand. If your Leader has the type "Donquixote Pirates", add up to 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

effect.text: You may discard 1 card from your hand. If your Leader has the type "Donquixote Pirates", add up to 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

meta.notes: Card is a sample with 'SAMPLE' watermark. Power and life stats are not printed on the card.
